title: Datte Asobi desho?
sinopse:
1. Datte Asobi desho? (But It's Just a Game, Right?)
2. Jitsu wa Honki desho? (So It's Actually Serious?)
3. Suki ni Nattara Sono Ato wa (After I Fell in Love)
4. Suki ni Nattara Sorebakari (After I Fell in Love, It's Always the Same)
5. Unforgettabl
6. Dakara Koko Made Kitan desho? (Have We Really Come This Far?)
